column6:
"BLACK MONDAY" Part 1 (of 2)!,2006,4
The New Excalibur team is still reeling from the events of M-Day and an attack by Lionheart. Now they must face a man who's caused quite a stir in London. A man that Juggernaut knows all too well!

32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Rick Ketcham | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan
